About the Company: Allahabad Bank is oldest nationalised Bank with rich experience in extending various banking solutions to its valued clients. Allahabad Bank is well spread out in India and recently opened first International Branch at Hong Kong. Bank has also arrangements with correspondents at various important overseas locations, which will ensure extending to its all NRI customers rich banking experience. Their products fall under the following broad categories Deposit products, Retail Credit products & other Credit Products like Kisan Credit Card,Kisan Shakti Yojana & AllBank-Expo; services offered include All Ayushman Bima Yojana , Cash Management Services , Depository Services ,Visa Debit Cum ATM Card ,Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) ,National Electronic Funds Transfer (NEFT) , Gold Card Scheme for Exporters ,Charter for MSMEs ,Government Business & Regional MSME Care Centres
